title: Completed PE Summary - Wave Sentinel
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Global Marine Systems
Port of registry: London
Flag: UK
Type: Cable ship
Built: 1995
Length overall: .01
Gross tonnage: 12330.00
Date & Time 22/08/02 12:27
Location of incident: English Coastal waters
Incident Type: Accident to person
Injuries/ fatalities: 1 fatality

Synopsis

A crewman was fatally crushed under steel plates when unsecured stanchions were removed to assist with the steel plate on to a recently constructed storage rack.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector wrote to the vessel operator highlighting three safety issues

  • No risk assessment for the work carried out

  • Inadequate supervision of the work carried out

  • Cultural differences on board can lead to unquestioned following of superiors orders
